TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時方法呼叫，或在控制項中的 [更新] 按鈕按一下時，但之後控制更新的項目。The control raises the event when the method is called or when an Update button in the control is clicked, but after the control updates the item. (更新 按鈕是一個按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」。)這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查更新作業的結果。(An Update button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Update".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an update operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 這個物件可讓您決定更新項目數目，並取得可能發生的任何例外狀況。This object enables you to determine the number of items updated and to get any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷，更新作業所影響的項目數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of items that were affected by the update operation, use the property. 若要判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 您可以使用來存取原始的欄位值屬性。You can access the original field values by using the property. 您可以使用存取更新的欄位值屬性。You can access updated field values by using the property. 根據預設，項目之後更新作業傳回唯讀模式。By default, the item returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 如果您處理更新作業期間發生的例外狀況，則可以保留處於編輯模式，藉由設定項目屬性`true`。If you handle an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the item in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件，以判斷是否更新作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the object to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#1)]

param.span: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

param.name: exception
param.span: 在執行更新作業時引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the update operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果沒有引發任何例外狀況，請使用 。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 在引發事件時，這個建構函式主要會由控制項開發人員使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中所包含的物件`e`參數。The object that is contained in the `e` parameter.| ||`false`。`false`.| ||`false`。`false`.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

value.span: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷受到更新作業的資料列數目，所傳回的資料來源。Use the property to determine the number of rows that were affected by the update operation, as returned by the data source. 由於通常只有一個項目更新時，這個屬性通常會包含值為 0 或 1。Because typically only one item is updated, this property usually contains a value of 0 or 1. 有時在更新作業期間可能發生錯誤不會引發例外狀況。Sometimes during the update operation an error can occur that does not raise an exception. 在此情況下，屬性可以用來驗證已更新項目。In that case, the property can be used to verify that an item was updated. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，確認已更新項目。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that an item was updated. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得更新作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 在更新作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)，而如果沒有引發例外狀況則為 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the update operation, if any; if no exception was raised, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。If no exception was raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況和您處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式中，設定中屬性`true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否則，控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否更新作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件期間處理更新作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled during the event.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在更新作業期間引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出您是否已處理的事件期間的例外狀況。If an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether you have handled the exception during the event. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況處理，而且不會重新擲回由視為控制項。If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown by the control. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`、控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。The following example shows how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 控制項是否在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果控制項在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項之後更新作業傳回唯讀模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode after an update operation. 設定屬性`true`指定控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式。Set the property to `true` to specify that the control should remain in edit mode. 這也會保留使用者輸入的值。This also preserves the values that the user has entered. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留控制項處於編輯模式時發生例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/CS/ListViewItemUpdatedCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated/VB/ListViewItemUpdatedVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新項目的新值。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new values for the updated item.
The new values for the updated item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用來存取新的欄位值，更新項目的屬性。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated item. 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄更新的項目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated items. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表更新的項目欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated item. > [!NOTE] > 捷徑，您可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新項目的原始值。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original values for the updated item.
The original values for the updated item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取原始欄位值的更新的項目。Use the property to access the original field values for the updated item. 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄更新的項目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated items. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含代表更新的項目欄位的物件。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated item. > [!NOTE] > 捷徑，您可以使用的索引子物件來存取該欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly.
